summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SUP'INTER University Management System. All backend APIs (21 tests) passed. Frontend login, navigation, and all requested pages working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Login page has proper data-testid attributes (email-input, password-input, login-submit-btn)
All pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Backend properly excludes MongoDB _id from responses
JWT authentication working correctly with 24h expiration
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - existing data used (3 campuses, 5 formations, 9 filieres, 1 admin user)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working: Login, Dashboard, Student Inscription, Student List, Filières, Finance Balance, Finance Journal, Users. Backend has 21 API tests covering auth, CRUD operations for all entities. The /api/absences endpoint is not implemented (returns 404).

features_tested.login: PASS - Login with admin@supinter.edu / password works correctly
features_tested.dashboard: PASS - Shows statistics cards, quick actions, charts, financial summary
features_tested.student_inscription: PASS - Form displays all fields (academic info, personal info, contact & finance)
features_tested.student_list: PASS - Shows filters (search, year, formation, filière, niveau), export buttons
features_tested.filieres: PASS - Lists 9 filières with formation badges, edit/delete actions
features_tested.finance_balance: PASS - Shows summary cards, monthly chart, category breakdown
features_tested.finance_journal: PASS - Shows summary cards, year filter, transaction table
features_tested.users: PASS - Shows user table with admin user, add button, role badges
